K12mekhdh_u:3: utrāsito 'bhūt* atha rāhulaḥ kumāras tasya rātryā atyayena bahulaiḥ kumārakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ
K12mekhdh_u:4: puraskṛtaḥ kapilavastuto 'bhiniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
K12mekhdh_u:5: bhagavataḥ pādayo śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthita rodati /
K12mekhdh_u:7: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda rāhulasya kumārasya pratisaṃrakṣaṇīyāṃ mekhalā nāma vidyā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ śṛṇvantu me devagaṇā nāgagaṇā rākṣasagaṇā (MDh_115r1)

K12mekhdh_u:13: mahāratiḥ mātṛgaṇāś ca ye samudrakalpasya rakṣakaḥ purasmiṃ diśābhāge hari nāma rākṣasī :
K12mekhdh_u:14: dakṣaṇasmiṃ diśābhāge goṇāsi nāma rākṣasī paścimasmiṃ diśābhāge kesari nāma rākṣasī /

K12mekhdh_u:66: brahmendrāś ca samāgataḥ maheśvaraś ca kumārāś cāpy ubhau samāgatau ye kecit kīrtitā bhūtā mekhalāya samāgata :
